alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 2:22PM CST until November 08 at 8:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A light mix of light freezing rain, sleet and snow expected. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch, and snow accumulations of a half inch or less. * WHERE...Oneida, Vilas, Florence, and Forest Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is expected to be two periods of mixed precipitation; one occurring this evening, and another late tonight into early Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
